headline: 3 Value Stocks in the Doghouse
summary: Value investing has created more billionaires than any other strategy, like Warren Buffett, who built his fortune by purchasing wonderful businesses at reasonable prices. But these hidden gems are few and far between - many stocks that appear cheap often stay that way because they face structural issues.

raw.headline: 3 Value Stocks in the Doghouse

But these hidden gems are few and far between - many stocks that appear cheap often stay that way because they face structural issues.

headline: Interpublic Group (IPG): Buy, Sell, or Hold Post Q4 Earnings?
summary: Interpublic Group has gotten torched over the last six months - since October 2024, its stock price has dropped 20.5% to $25.03 per share. This was partly driven by its softer quarterly results and may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
